DataElement.preferredDefinition: An indication that the subject has abstained from food/water for the specified amount of time.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pharmacokinetic Concentration Domain Pharmacokinetic Concentration Fasting Status
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A subject domain utilized for the submission of information encompassing and representing data, vocabulary or records related to pharmacokinetic concentration._Indicates whether a specimen that had undergone a pharmacokinetic concentration assessment was obtained from a subject that had abstained from food and possibly water for the prescribed amount of time.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record whether the subject was fasting prior to the test being performed.

ReferenceDocuments.name: PCFAST
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Results may be affected by whether the subject was fasting. Some study treatments may have a food effect and it is important to know whether the dose was taken while the subject was fasted.
